sentence.text: Genotype-phenotype correlation was clarified after combined analysis of the cases and the literature review; anemia was most severe in HS patients with mutations on the ER to Golgi vesicle-mediated transport spectrin-binding domain (p AAAA 0.05), and MAPK cascade mutations in HS patients spared the tetramerization domain in which mutations of hereditary elliptocytosis and pyropoikilocytosis are located.
